about_the_game:
Forknight: Cattle Royale is a retro-inspired roguelike adventure set in a dystopian future where cows have taken over the world. You play as Fork Knight, a brave warrior armed with a mystical trident, on a mission to overthrow the tyrannical cow regime.

Waking up in a world where humans are enslaved by cows, Fork Knight must navigate through branching paths, strategize his movements, and utilize upgrades after each level to enhance his abilities. He focuses on strategic gameplay that rewards movement and positioning, offering a unique challenge where you must outmaneuver hordes of cows instead of killing them.

With a beautifully crafted pixel art style and high-quality transition screens, Forknight: Cattle Royale combines old-school charm with modern design elements. Face off against a variety of enemies, including elemental and robotic cows, each with their own abilities and interactions with the environment. Progress through three acts filled with epic boss battles, dynamic tile systems, and objective-based levels to liberate the future.

Features

- Branching Paths: Experience a non-linear adventure with multiple routes to explore, offering diverse challenges and unique encounters in each playthrough.
- Three Acts: Embark on an epic journey divided into three distinct acts, each with its own story arc and escalating challenges.
- Upgrades After Levels: Enhance Fork Knight’s abilities with a robust upgrade system, allowing you to tailor your skills and strategies after each level.
- Strategic Gameplay: Master a gameplay style that rewards movement and positioning, focusing on evasion and tactical maneuvers rather than direct combat.
- Epic Boss Battles: Face off against formidable bosses, including upright elemental and robotic cows, each with unique attack patterns and strategies.
- Pixel Art Style: Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted pixel art world, blending retro aesthetics with modern design elements.
- High-Quality Transition Screens: Enjoy hyperrealistic transition screens between levels, enhancing the storytelling and visual experience.
- Varied Enemy Types: Encounter a wide array of enemies, from basic cows to elemental and robotic variations, each posing different threats.
- Dynamic Tile System: Navigate through a dynamic environment where cows and their abilities can affect each other and the surroundings, adding depth to the gameplay.
- Objective-Based Levels: Progress through levels by reaching specific objectives or navigating to the end, all while managing the relentless hordes of cows.

name: Forknight: Cattle Royale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 600 MB available space MB available space

short_description: A valiant knight embarks on a perilous quest to find a mystical portal that will lead him back to his homeland. Clad in gleaming armor and wielding his trusted fork, he traverses treacherous landscapes only to be haunted by none other than...cows.
